entry.title: Hello World
entry.content:
Hello world! My name is Mandy Tjew-A-Sin and this is my web page. I will be writing here about my research and topics that interest me. I’m currently doing a PhD at the VU University Amsterdam, at the Clinical Neuro and Developmental Psychology Department. Here is an overview of what I am interested in:

If you’re into RSS feeds, you can follow me here. Thanks for reading!
